nodes.bodyText: Done. Please check if it's correct or not and let me know.

before inner classes it is not class above, but interface.
Please use "inner type" instead of class/interface, as check name says
no need for inner inner classes. Keep it simple, just one inner type

violation comment is misplaced.
comments should be on lines where violation is reported.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -36,6 +36,48 @@ * 
  * <module name="InnerTypeLast"/>
  *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * class Test { // violation, field should be declared before inner types.

  *

nodes.bodyText:
field
it is not a field
also check will report violation even if there is only one nested type. Please remove other types and leave only one.
